title: [RESOLVED] Server Issues - 21st Jan 2015
body:
**UPDATE @ 1155 AEDT**
The issue looks like it was related to a brief network outage within our services.  The connection was restored and the service appears to have recovered.  We're monitoring now to make sure everything is stable.


-----


** ORIGINAL POST **
Hi folks,

We're looking into an issue with the OCE League of Legends servers at the moment, which is causing games to not start/end correctly.

I'll post updates here when I have them.


Cheers
Mindstar

replies.body: Yup it really did suck I was silver 2 with high mmr. Won 8 games lost 2 and it put me in silver 5 :(
